name: Octopus.do
title: octopus.do
shortDescription: Octopus.do is a visual sitemap tool designed for both beginners and professionals in web development. It facilitates the planning and structuring of website content, allowing users to collaborate, create wireframes, and integrate with services like Figma. Users can also analyze SEO and export their plans to various formats, making it ideal for those looking to streamline their website development process.
cons: May be complex for absolute beginners
Potential learning curve for advanced features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: MindMeister
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on mind mapping for planning

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Dyno Mapper
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Visual sitemap and content audit tool
